Package snakes

Class SkipSquare

  • java.lang.Object
    • snakes.Square
      • snakes.SkipSquare

  • public class SkipSquare
extends snakes.Square
    SkipSquare is another special square: When a player lands on it, the next Player has to skip his turn.

    • Method Detail

      • enter

        public void enter​(snakes.Player player)
        Description copied from interface: snakes.ISquare
        Final Step of a Player to enter this square. It can only be called if this Square is already empty (because only one player can be on one square)
        Overrides:
        enter in class snakes.Square
        Parameters:
        player - The Player which enters the square
